h2_title: The Webbed Hollow Luojia Fragrant Vines
h3_title: Temple of the Yellow Flowers Luojia Fragrant Vine
content: The Temple of the Yellow Flowers Luojia Fragrant Vine is accessible after defeating the Violet Spider in the Webbed Hollow. Follow the spiders up the hill after defeating the boss to find yourself near the trail leading to the Temple of the Yellow Flowers. The vine is hanging from the branches of a tree right at the start of the trail.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Luojia_Fragrant_Vine_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow Luojia Fragrant Vines' and the sub-subsection 'Temple of the Yellow Flowers Luojia Fragrant Vine'.
The content is as follows:
The Temple of the Yellow Flowers Luojia Fragrant Vine is accessible after defeating the Violet Spider in the Webbed Hollow. Follow the spiders up the hill after defeating the boss to find yourself near the trail leading to the Temple of the Yellow Flowers. The vine is hanging from the branches of a tree right at the start of the trail.
